name: Classic_Espresso_Bookshelf
reviews: We are very happy with the look of this bookshelf. The design is very nice and the size is just what we needed. The reason I took off a star is because a pair of the pre-drilled holes were in the wrong place. The bottom middle divider's peg holes were about 0.5 inches off from where they needed to be and had to be re-drilled. Luckily, the extra holes are hidden under the divider, so you would never know once it's all together.
I would have put excellent, but the order that the instructions indicated was not easy. Also, a couple of the screws were difficult to connect.
description:
The Classic Espresso Collection is a beautiful combination of
design, functions and features. The collection features a rich,
espresso finish and boasts a great selection of storage, seating
and accessory pieces. Perfect for storing books, toys or games.
Fixed center shelf and finished back panel. Ages 3+Colors/finish: EspressoMaterials: Birch Veneered MDF flat surfaces, pine posts and
  legsQuantity: 1Setting: IndoorDimensions: 31.5" x 11" x 24"Fixed center shelfFinished back panelTimeles lookStyleTraditionalMaterialMDF, Veneer, WoodFinishEspressoAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorEspressoFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes HardwareStorage TypeBookcases and Shelves
